name: Procrastination Simulator [GB]
description:
Procrastination Simulator GB is a visual novel in which you're an aspiring game developer who hasn't completed any project yet. Will you work on your project, or get distracted by the many distractions on the way?

GB Version is a demake of the original Procrastination Simulator: An interactive fiction by the same author (@ahmadmanga.) This version uses a completely different script and pixel art with the look and feel of the original GameBoy. Developed with GB Studio.

Controls:

* Alt/Z : Confirm
* Ctrl/X : Cancel
* Up/Down Arrows : Move between options.

Credits:

* Script and Visuals: @ahmadmanga
* GameBoy in the Cover: Dylan Tarhan's Free Overlay.
